attributes.action: Make Football Clubs in the EFL 2 and above charge no more than £20 for a ticket
attributes.background: Football clubs these days are charging way too much for tickets so that their fans can watch the team play football whether it's a home game or away game. Some clubs are even charging more than £20 for a child to watch a game of football. Football was originally a working class sport.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of football clubs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
